Class
Description
AbstractRequest
The base of the API requests
AbstractSearchItems
 
Album
Represents a spotify album
Serialized from Album
AlbumGet
Get Spotify catalog information for a single album.
AlbumTracks
Represents the spotify tracks associated with an album
Serialized from AlbumTracks
AlbumTracksGet
Get Spotify catalog information about an album’s tracks.
Artist
 
ArtistAlbums
 
ArtistGet
Get Spotify catalog information for a single artist identified by their unique Spotify ID.
ArtistsAlbumsGet
Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's albums.
ArtistsRelatedArtistsGet
Get Spotify catalog information about artists similar to a given artist.
ArtistsTopTracksGet
Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's top tracks by country.

Country

Episode
 
EpisodeGet

FeaturedPlaylistGet
Get a list of Spotify featured playlists (shown, for example, on a Spotify player's 'Browse' tab).
GenreAvailableGet
Retrieve a list of available genres seed parameter values for recommendations.
Group
 
HttpMethod
Represents the type of the HTTP request
HttpRequest
Represents a HTTP request, used for doing every request to spotify's API
HttpResponse
Represent the response from a HttpRequest
IRequest
 
JSONArray
A dense indexed sequence of values.
JSONException
Thrown to indicate a problem with the JSON API.
JSONObject
A modifiable set of name/value mappings.
JSONString
The JSONString interface allows a toJSONString() method so that a class can change the behavior of JSONObject.toString(), JSONArray.toString(), and JSONWriter.value(Object).
JSONStringer
Implements JSONObject.toString() and JSONArray.toString().
JSONTokener
Parses a JSON (RFC 4627) encoded string into the corresponding object.
Main
 
MarketsAvailableGet
Get the list of markets where Spotify is available.

PlaylistGet

PlaylistImageGet
Get the current image associated with a specific playlist.
PlaylistTracksGet
Get full details of the items of a playlist owned by a Spotify user.

Note: Chapters are only available for the US, UK, Ireland, New Zealand and Australia markets.
